title: Worlds of IF (February 1972)
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. (Contents information excerpted from The Internet Speculative Fiction Database ) Art: Patterns of Chaos (Part 1 of 3) by Jack Gaughan The Cast-Iron Rat by Jack Gaughan Time Patrol by uncredited Sheltering Dream by Jack Gaughan The Castoffs by Jack Gaughan Essays: Hue and Cry (If, January-February 1972) by Ejler Jakobsson Sf Calendar (If, January-February 1972) by uncredited Reading Room (If, January-February 1972) by Lester del Rey Novelette: The Cast-Iron Rat by Harry Harrison Serial: Patterns of Chaos (Part 1 of 3) by Colin Kapp Short Stories: Time Patrol by Joe L. Hensley Sheltering Dream by Doris Piserchia The Castoffs by Douglas R. Mason
